title: Chicken and Scallion Oil

ingredients.name: scallion whites (one bunch, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces)

steps: In a small saucepan, add the chicken fat, scallions, and garlic cloves.
Heat over medium to medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until the scallions take on a light golden hue and smell fragrant, around 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat, reserve in the pot, and allow it to cool.
Strain and transfer to a container.
If not used immediately, store in the fridge for up to 6 months.
notes: This aroma oil is really nice for ramen bowls that are light in their richness.
125 mL is approximately 0.5 cup, converted to approximately 113 grams (chicken fat is less dense than water).
Store in the fridge for up to 6 months.
